<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3591449/202504/3591449-20250430170425818-1218456697.png" alt="" loading="lazy"><br>
觉得图片右边那个翻译的插件很有趣，自己手痒了，打算做一个试试类似<a href="https://microsoftedge.microsoft.com/addons/detail/%E5%88%92%E8%AF%8D%E7%BF%BB%E8%AF%91/oikmahiipjniocckomdccmplodldodja" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">划词翻译</a>的插件</p>
<p>登录<a href="https://microsoftedge.microsoft.com/addons/Microsoft-Edge-Extensions-Home?hl=zh-CN" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">Edge插件官网</a>查看扩展<br>
浏览器搜索<code>edge扩展怎么写</code><br>
参考<a href="https://www.zhihu.com/question/49984547/answers/updated#:~:text=%E4%B8%80%E4%B8%AA%E5%9F%BA%E6%9C%AC%E7%9A%84Edge%E6%89%A9%E5%B1%95%E5%BA%94%E8%AF%A5%E5%8C%85%E5%90%AB%E4%BB%A5%E4%B8%8B%E5%87%A0%E4%B8%AA%E7%BB%84%E6%88%90%E9%83%A8%E5%88%86%3A%201%20%E5%8C%85%E5%90%AB%E5%9F%BA%E6%9C%AC%E5%B9%B3%E5%8F%B0%E4%BF%A1%E6%81%AF%E7%9A%84%E5%BA%94%E7%94%A8%E7%A8%8B%E5%BA%8F%E6%B8%85%E5%8D%95%20JSON%20%E6%96%87%E4%BB%B6%EF%BC%88Manifest%EF%BC%89%E3%80%82%202%20%E5%AE%9A%E4%B9%89%E8%AF%A5%E5%87%BD%E6%95%B0%E7%9A%84,JavaScript%20%E6%96%87%E4%BB%B6%E3%80%82%203%20%E5%AE%9A%E4%B9%89%E7%94%A8%E6%88%B7%E7%95%8C%E9%9D%A2%E7%9A%84%20HTML%20%E5%92%8C%20CSS%20%E6%96%87%E4%BB%B6%E3%80%82" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">知乎|如何从零开始写一个Edge扩展？</a> 和 <a href="https://juejin.cn/post/7299384357826510882" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">稀土掘金|Edge浏览器插件开发从入门到上架</a><br>
自己写了一遍manifest.json，又通过<a href="https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-edge/extensions-chromium/getting-started/manifest-format?tabs=v3" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">Manifest file format for extensions</a>大致了解一下都有哪些项，图标和加载什么的<br>
让豆包先写了一部分内容，自己又修修改改，花了近5个小时吧，改完了，弄了一个选中文字点击下载为txt文件的大致插件，然后通过试图上传官网，但卡在了注册的地方</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3591449/202504/3591449-20250430171620050-887747289.png" alt="" loading="lazy"><br>
改了地方缩写也没用，先放弃了<br>
图片还加载不出来，部分网页还无法显示<br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3591449/202504/3591449-20250430172601583-152030925.png" alt="" loading="lazy"><br>

github也登不上去，这边还刮大风了<br>
做的文件先放蓝奏云吧 <a href="https://wwrd.lanzoum.com/iODv22uxxedg" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">链接</a></p>
